params.textField:
Statistical Machine Translation systems involve three phases: the first phase is called *training*. This is the phase in which a system learns a *translation model* from a parallel corpus and a *language model* from a monolingual corpus in the target language.

The second phase is called *tuning*. It involves finding the optimum weights to assign to the translation model and the language model so that the system outputs the "best" translation.

The third phase is called *decoding*. This is when a system that has already been *trained* and tuned is given a new sentence or text to translate.
